thread.section_title: 2Friends Beach Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Entebbe, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely friendly happy hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely friendly happy hotel - Review of 2Friends Beach Hotel, Entebbe, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Tinkerbell013
title: Lovely friendly happy hotel
text:
What a lovely welcome we got at 2Friends where the entire team of staff were so incredibly friendly.
We had booked a cheap room on booking.com which turned out to be a small room with no balcony - most other (more expensive) rooms have balconies, but this didn't bother us, the bed was very comfy, there were no mozzies and the bathroom was huge.
Delicious breakfast in a lovely room overlooking the garden, amazing avocado and choice of teas.
Great location also, only 10 minutes drive from the airport, their pick up service was just perfect. The beach bar has stunning views over the lake plus it's just 10 minutes walk to a convenient shopping mall with a nice cafe and several places where you could exchange currency.
Evening menu extensive with a range of cuisine, perfect for when you've had enough goat curry to last you a while.
All in all, fab, would definitely stay again.
